channel.title: Need help from i vain i!
channel.description: hey i vain i they told me that u r master pi i am using pi so can u help me with a few problems? thank you....

item.title: Need help from i vain i!
item.dc:creator: @youridudock youridudock
item.description:
@youridudock wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”][quote author=sorlante link=topic=500890.msg3664062#msg3664062 date=1310510849]
can’t understand…
@echo off
title Rune-X-Scape
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_26\bin\java.exe” -Xmx2500m -cp bin;deps/poi.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar;deps/jython.jar;log4j-1.2.15.jar; server.Server
pause
[/quote]You’re trying to initialize a heap of 2.5G of memory.

Try using;

@echo off title Rune-X-Scape "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_26\bin\java.exe" -Xmx512m -cp bin;deps/poi.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar;deps/jython.jar;log4j-1.2.15.jar; server.Server pause[/quote]

Wow, Where were you when i asked a fix for that in the General Questions section? lol

Read full topic

item.title: Need help from i vain i!
item.dc:creator: @usman555 usman555
item.description:
@usman555 wrote:

[quote=“sorlante, post:11, topic:403829”]ohh…ok compile is working…
and what about the run.bat?!
the message shows like this:

Error occurred during initilazation of VM
Could not reserve enough space for object heap
Could not create the java virtual machine.
Press any key to continue…

i think that’s a problem:(
hope u can help…
thank you.[/quote]Post your run code. Also, you are a very excited person. Calm down and it won’t seem like someone’s running and screaming for their lives in my head when I read your posts.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help from i vain i!
item.dc:creator: @Adobe Adobe
item.description:
@Adobe wrote:

[quote=“sorlante, post:8, topic:403829”]i just don’t know why but it shows like this:

Note: client.java uses unchecked or unsafe operations.
Note: recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details.
Press any key to continue…

so u can help i am just a starter for making server…
so don’t know every thing
hope u can help…
thank you.[/quote]

I just lol’d… even the most enexpeirenced person could have told you that, -creds to superman for anwsering though-
